org.dbasu.robomvvm.binding

Class TypedValueConverter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.dbasu.robomvvm.binding.TypedValueConverter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ValueConverter

    public class TypedValueConverter
extends java.lang.Object
implements ValueConverter
    A value converter that attempts to convert between a source type and a target type.

      Modifier and Type Field and Description

      protected java.lang.Class targetType

    • Constructor Detail

      • TypedValueConverter

        public TypedValueConverter(java.lang.Class sourceType,
                   java.lang.Class targetType)
        Constructs a typed value converter for converting values between types.
        Parameters:
        sourceType - The type to convert the target value to in the function convertToSource(Object).
        targetType - The type to convert the source value to in the function convertToTarget(Object).

    • Method Detail

      • convertToTarget

        public java.lang.Object convertToTarget(java.lang.Object value)
        Attempt to convert the value of the source property to the target type. If the type of the source property is assignable to the target type, it performs a cast. If it is not, and the target type is String, it calls the the source property's Object.toString() function.
        Specified by:
        convertToTarget in interface ValueConverter
        Parameters:
        value - The value of the source property.
        Returns:
        The result of the conversion of the source property to the target type.
        Throws:
        java.lang.RuntimeException - When the conversion fails.

      • convertToSource

        public java.lang.Object convertToSource(java.lang.Object value)
        Attempt to convert the value of the target property to the source type. If the type of the target property is assignable to the source type, it performs a cast. If it is not, and the source type is String, it calls the the target property's Object.toString() function.
        Specified by:
        convertToSource in interface ValueConverter
        Parameters:
        value - The value of the target property.
        Returns:
        The result of the conversion of the target property to the source type.
        Throws:
        java.lang.RuntimeException - When the conversion fails.
